oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 4 songs; "Raven and Crow"; Whale story; Message to S.S. Peter; Giant Woman story; Love song; Story of the little bird; Spirit song; Shaker songs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lamont, Martha
McDewitt, Martha
Cladosby, Ernest
James, Agnes
Metcalf, Leon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
-From Metcalf Tape 25:

    Side A: Tulalip Reservation
  • Martha Williams Lamont- 4 songs;
  • Myth: Raven and Crow;
  • Whale Story;
  • Message to S.S. Peter;
  • Songs by Ernest Cladosby, Martha McDewitt & Agnes James;
  • A. James: Giant Woman story (beg.)
    Side B:
  • Giant Woman story (end);
  • A. James- "Raven and Crow";
  • Martha W. Lamont- Love song;
  • Story of the litle bird;
  • Spirit song;
  • Shaker songs.

-From the Metcalf Collection at the Burke Museum, University of Washington, Seattle.

-From 2007-101-T-63 and 2007-T-64 (copy of side B only)
